Resources
=========

### Faculty of Computing

### ONLINE SYSTEM & QUICK ACCESS

[![](https://comp.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/my-utm.png)](https://my.utm.my/login)

##### [myUTM](https://my.utm.my/login)

MyUTM is a platform designed to support students, providing a one-stop station to access E-Learning, aimsweb, and other academic resources efficiently

[![](https://comp.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/elearning-1.png)](https://elearning.utm.my/)

##### [E-Learning](https://elearning.utm.my/)

UTM E-Learning assists students in accessing learning materials. Log in using your Academic Computing ID (ACID) on the E-Learning portal.

[![](https://comp.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/PSM.png)](https://comp.utm.my/psm/)

##### [Final Year Project (PSM)](https://comp.utm.my/psm/)

The undertaken project must include programming elements with appropriate users’s complexity and meets PSM scop

![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)

##### e-PPP

Students Evaluation of Teaching System Online (e-PPP) is designed to evaluate teaching and courses that enrolled by our students

![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)

##### Training and Courses

The Faculty of Computing provides online training and professional development to support Malaysia’s Digital Media Industry towards the Fourth Industrial Revolution

![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)

##### Course Registration

Students enrolled in a program for a semester must register all intended courses for that same semester

![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)

##### Rental Our Facilities

Students Evaluation of Teaching System Online (e-PPP) is designed to evaluate teaching and courses that enrolled by our students

![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)

##### Lab Management

The Faculty of Computing provides online training and professional development to support Malaysia’s Digital Media Industry towards the Fourth Industrial Revolution

[![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)](https://news.utm.my/)

##### [UTM NewsHub](https://news.utm.my/)

Access the latest updates, news, and information about UTM through the official news hub, keeping you informed and connected daily

![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)

##### Industrial Training

Industrial training is a main component in the Bachelor of Computer Science curriculum at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (UTM)

![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)

##### FC Oshe

Akta OSH 1994 yang digariskan oleh Jabatan Keselamatan dan Kesihatan di bawah Kementerian Sumber Manusia, Malaysia

![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)

##### Lestari

Integrating three pillars of sustainability: Green practices, Energy efficiency, and the 5S Program for comprehensive and sustainable development.

![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)

##### FC Photo Gallery

Photos from Faculty of Computing events and activities are uploaded and stored here. Take a look and explore them now!

![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)

##### For Staffs

Presentation slides from previous staff engagement sessions held with the faculty Dean to foster communication and collaboration

![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)

##### UTM NewsHub

Access the latest updates, news, and information about UTM through the official news hub, keeping you informed and connected daily
